info.description: Retrieves the list and details of online accounts
info.title: Holdings Online Accounts APIs

get.summary: Retrieves the account specific information for Internet Banking Users

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

sharedLimitAccounts.description: Denotes the accounts in which the credit card Limit is assigned to the customer across all the credit cards

sharedLimitAccount.description: Denotes the account in which the credit card limit is assigned to the customer across all the credit cards

sharedLimitAccountType.description: Indicates the type of shared limit account

taxRates.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

taxRate.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

interests.description: Contains the sum of the cash interest expense (including that attributable to Capitalized Leases), net of cash interest income, of the borrower and the Restricted Subsidiaries, determined on a consolidated basis.

interestPropertyName.description: Contains the property name of loan interest such as penalty Interest and principal interest.

interestCompoundType.description: Indicates the interest compound type of an account

interestCompoundTypeValue.description: Indicates the interest compound type value of an account

consolidateInterest.description: Contains the sum of the cash interest expense and net of cash interest income of the borrower and the restricted subsidiaries determined on a consolidated basis

sharedInterestAccounts.description: Contains the account details which shares the interest among the eligible or joint customers.

sharedInterestAccount.description: Contains the account details which shares the interest among the eligible or joint customers.

sharedInterestAccountType.description: Indicates the type of shared interest account

charges.description: Specifies the charges which has incurred with processing of the cheque

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: Indicates Payment type set to an account

propertyName.description: Indicates the Id of the product property

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: Indicates the payment frequency associated with the charge

openActualBalance.description: Contains the opening actual balance of an account

availableOverdraftLimit.description: Contains the overdraft limit still available to be utilized

openingDate.description: The date the account is opened.

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

availableFunds.description: Total funds available in the account after all the ongoing transactions have been completed

outstandingOverdraftLimit.description: Indicates the outstanding overdraft limit of an account

onlineClearedBalance.description: Indicates the available balance allowed to use

openClearedBalance.description: Indicates the opening balance after clearing

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System
